attributes.action: Please change the date of indoor mixing from 17/05/21 to 12/05/21.
attributes.additional_details:
On Christmas time people get the chance to visit there family. 

Last year I didn’t get the chance to visit any of my relatives during Eid. And this year, all the Muslims going to miss the opportunity for 5 days only. And they need to wait another 360 days for the next Eid to celebrate with the family.
attributes.background: Review the petition and if it is not harmful to the public safety, please change date in the road map
